title: Llama 3.1 Released: Meta’s New Open-Source AI Model that You can Fine-Tune,
excerpt: Meta announced the release of Llama 3.1, the most capable model in the LLama Series. This latest iteration of the Llama series, particularly the 405B model, represents a substantial advancement in open-source AI capabilities, positioning Meta at the forefront of AI innovation.  Meta has long advocated for open-source AI, a stance underscored by Mark Zuckerberg’s assertion that open-source benefits developers, Meta, and society. Llama 3.1 embodies this philosophy by offering state-of-the-art capabilities in an openly accessible model.
